attributes.action: Stop the discrimination against young drivers nationwide and allow areas for gatherings of car enthusiasts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: nationwide we have a problem that the police seem to take the wrong action persistently to resolve. if the above issues were addressed properly instead of police enforcing 'discriminating' laws in towns such as blackwood, south wales and instead allowing this growing trend to safely enjoy there hobby then they would not be forced onto the streets or illegal events. we are asking for councils individually to look for areas in their jurisdiction that can aid this.
